p: Histopathologic findings from kidney tissues supported the results of the crude extract and solvent fractions of Croton macrostachyus on biochemical results. Kidney isolated from the normal control group showed normal structures of the kidney. While cyclophosphamide alone administration resulted in distorted bowmanâ€™s capsule, inflammation and necrosis, rats treated with Croton macrostachyus showed a decreased number of inflammatory cells and mild congestion.
